item.title: Using the 80/20 Rule to Learn awk Effortlessly
item.description: The length only accounts for 20%, but the effectiveness reaches 80% - 80/20 Rule What can you learn from this article? In this article, we will learn how to use the 80/20 rule to effortlessly learn the linux text processing command awk. After reading this article, you will learn a fast learning method, and how to use awk to process text and stdout. Recently, while learning awk, I found that there are really many details.
